title: Ebro In The Morning - King Richard Review + Thanksgiving Drama
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 11/23.

Ebro and the crew talk about King Richard (33), how the New York Giants played themselves (29) and focus on the Holiday.

Click here to learn about the Hot 97 - Securing the Future initiative. 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.
